content: The full Bull King's Set of Armor and Gear is located within Chapter 5 - Flaming Mountains in the secret Bishui Cave area. It is craftable at any Shrine upon defeating the Bishui Golden-Eyed Beast within this secret area.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Bull_King's_Set.md', within the main section titled 'Bull King's Set'.
The content is as follows:
The full Bull King's Set of Armor and Gear is located within Chapter 5 - Flaming Mountains in the secret Bishui Cave area. It is craftable at any Shrine upon defeating the Bishui Golden-Eyed Beast within this secret area.
